product_meta.title: LapWorks Laptop Desk 2.0
product_meta.description:
For best use, sit with legs relaxed and natural, wider than the awkward knees together position when using a laptop without our desk.

LapWorks offers 2 portable, folding Laptop Desks to choose from, both made entirely of the same strong ,yet flexible, polycarbonate plastic with non-slip rubber pads. They will bend but won’t break.

The Laptop Desk 2.0 is a heavy duty lap desk that is also a typing stand and the Futura Laptop Desk is our stylish laptop desk. 

For those who just want a strong, durable, and portable lap tray to make their mobile computing experience comfortable and ergonomic, the Laptop Desk 2.0 is an excellent choice.
